Summary: {dr}just looked out front window and seen about 10 lights in sky off the clouds not on ground, it was right about the clouds
divs: sighting detailsi was about to go to bed i looked out the window, seen lights grabbed my partner to look. it was a little after 11pm and these lights had no reflections off ground seemed above clouds, moving eratically. almost a diagonal then it would like burst outward and then come back in . watched it for atlkeast 10 minutes. grabbed the camera took pictures and video but it was really dark. partner kept telling me it was nothing but i keep remebering it .. never seen anthing like it. it was not a plane, not a helicopter nor anything i ever seen. i then loked the next day and people had video of it online youtube the exact thing i saw but i couldnt get a clear picture.. here is exactly what i saw! please it cant be any beam of ligt from the ground bc i would have seen a light path form ground i believe.... anyway here is exactly what i saw! and i was not the onnly one who seen this!!!!!! please let me know what this is ! [link moved to fi section\cms\tg]
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
